description: Whether you prefer a subtle or bold taste, this drink will have your mouth watering. It combines peach purée with cucumber and&nbsp;whiskey to create a sensational flavor that's perfect for any occasion!
name: Evening Shade
recipeIngredient: 3⁄4 oz. Domaine de Canton ginger liqueur

recipeInstructions.name: Muddle lime juice and cucumber in a cocktail shaker.
recipeInstructions.text: Muddle lime juice and cucumber in a cocktail shaker.

recipeInstructions.name: Add peach purée, whiskey, liqueurs, and ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Add peach purée, whiskey, liqueurs, and ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass filled with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass filled with ice.
